text: Thelitcham Monthly is an Islamic cultural magazine in the Malayalam language published by students of Darul Huda Islamic University, Kerala, India. The magazine was launched on October 1998 as a literary contribution of the students at the University. Dr. Bahauddeen Muhammed Nadwi serves as the chief editor of the magazine. Besides research articles on Islam and Muslims, Thelitcham analyses various issues from an Islamic and general perspective. It deals with issues like history, sociology, culture, aesthetics and ethics. The magazine has addressed social issues such as the rights of transgender people in Islam, female suffrage, rationalism, liberalism, and fascism. Thelicham monthly has been in print since October 1998. ==References== ==External links== *Official Website Category:1998 establishments in India Category:Islamic magazines Category:Magazines established in 1998 Category:Malayalam-language magazines Category:Monthly magazines published in India Category:Mass media in Kerala Category:Student magazines
title: Thelitcham Monthly
